goal: Merge Monk level 1-3 features from PR #394 into main

sessions.notes: Merged main, resolved conflicts in loader.go, events.go, refs/conditions.go, refs/features.go. Fixed API type changes (DamageChain moved to events, WeaponRef changed to *core.Ref). Added UnarmedStrike ref. Fixed linter issues.

sessions.task: Second merge with latest main (pointer changes)
sessions.notes: Main moved forward with AbilityScores pointer changes. Resolved conflicts in gamectx package (characters.go, gamectx.go, gamectx_test.go). Fixed martial_arts_test.go to use *gamectx.AbilityScores directly instead of shared.NewAbilityScores. All tests pass.

monk_features_verified: MartialArts condition (DEX for monk weapons, scaling damage)
Flurry of Blows (1 ki, 2 unarmed strikes)
Patient Defense (1 ki, Dodge as bonus action)
Step of the Wind (1 ki, Disengage/Dash)
